| icon              = poe2 padded_armor_xoti icon.png
| description       = Xoti's gambeson conceals a layer of mail beneath its modest exterior. The humble vestments mark the wearer as a follower of Gaun, an aspect of Eothas. Such protection is often necessary for any Eothasian who finds themselves in parts of Eora where the wounds of the Saint's War are still fresh.
